items.desc: Added alternating row colors and hover highlights to the Quarterly Expense Report table for better readability and visual clarity.
Introduced subtle but slightly stronger alternate row shading to enhance table legibility without being distracting.
Income and Expenditure filter checkboxes added above the table; selecting/deselecting them dynamically updates the table and corresponding charts.
Added Quarterly Expense Report page with interactive charts, budget gauge, and table view for Q2 2025.
Enhanced the page with light gradient background and responsive layout for better readability and mobile experience.
Included contextual note highlighting increased costs due to special festivals and urgent maintenance, displayed only for relevant quarters.
Countdown to Kali Puja is added on the home page (index.html) to help visitors track the upcoming festival.
diwali.html page is added and will be invoked automatically on 20th Oct 2025 to celebrate Diwali.
Governing body page has been updated to reflect the selected EC members during AGM held on 27th July 2025.
Updated darshan.html page to include a dedicated Virtual Darshan section for an enhanced spiritual experience.
Added Durga Puja Nirghanta section, providing detailed and accessible event information.
